EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, last chance to get a preview of upcoming product updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Join us for the July BigCommerce Town Hall. During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at the lastest product updates. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Join us for the July BigCommerce Town Hall <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/07-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]>. During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at:
- Stencil theme updates - Optimized checkout update - Amazon beta - Responsive control panel navigation - And more!
We'll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by logging in and commenting in our Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/group/0F913000000HLTBCA4?t=1461271876897]]>. BigCommerce Town Hall <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/07-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]> When: Tuesday, July 26, 2016 2:00 PM - 3:00 PM CDT What: A discussion of BigCommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A. Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and the BigCommerce Product Team
Reserve your spot <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/07-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]> If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/article/BigCommerce-Town-Halls?t=1461271876897]]> and Partner Portal. Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
